code: import axios from'axios';export var register=function register(user){return axios.post('users/register',{username:user.username,phone:user.phone,email:user.email,password:user.password,name:user.name,address:user.address,status:user.status}).then(function(res){if(res.data.status==true){alert(res.data.data);}else if(res.data.status==false){alert(res.data.error);}});};export var login=function login(user){return axios.post('users/login',{username:user.username,password:user.password,status:user.status}).then(function(res){if(res.data.status==true){console.log('Login!');alert("Login Successful");localStorage.setItem('usertoken',res.data.accesstoken);return res.data.accesstoken;}else if(res.data.status==false){alert(res.data.error);}}).catch(function(err){alert(err);});};
